title: How to Quick Lap in Frappe Snowland for Mario Kart 64

steps.headline: Turn around at the starting line.
steps.description: Avoid going over the line at the start of the race.

steps.headline: Drive to the halfway mark of the bridge.
steps.description: Lakitu will shoot down, warning the player to reverse again, but just ignore him.

steps.headline: Drive and hop in the corner where the bridge and snow meets.
steps.description: Do not touch the course or fall into the water, or else this will not work.

steps.headline: Drive up on the hill, off course.
Go past the starting line onto the "ice block".
Have Lakitu pick your kart up.
steps.description: He will position you back on the track.

steps.headline: Go pass the starting line, on course.
Make the "lap" in about 20 seconds.
steps.description: Turn around and repeat until the end of the game.

text: Turn around at the starting line. Avoid going over the line at the start of the race. Drive to the halfway mark of the bridge. Lakitu will shoot down, warning the player to reverse again, but just ignore him. Drive and hop in the corner where the bridge and snow meets. Do not touch the course or fall into the water, or else this will not work. Drive up on the hill, off course.  Go past the starting line onto the "ice block".  Have Lakitu pick your kart up. He will position you back on the track. Go pass the starting line, on course. It will say "2nd Lap". Make the "lap" in about 20 seconds. Turn around and repeat until the end of the game.
